website_summaries.verdict: An affordable and simply designed coffee table. Practical yet has a stylish retro feel.
pros: This coffee table captures a fashionable reclaimed look with chrome frame and hardwood-effect surface
Highly functional, well-constructed, and easy to assemble
cons: A handful of users report not receiving all hardware needed for assembly

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to assemble. For the price it looks good, but don't inspect it too closely. A recommended buy on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the money this is an excellent table
customer_reviews.text: Love this table so far, we've had it for about 2 months now and it still looks great, including the chrome. And that's with two huskies that like to chew their bones against it grinding at the chrome all the time and driving me crazy. The faux wood top looks great, it looks very real (until you get super up close with it). It's also very sturdy, I'm 230lbs and I sit on it all the time and it doesn't budge, bend or move at all. It also has nice plastic feet that don't scratch the wood floors. For the money this is an excellent table.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Coffee table of my dreams? uhhh YES
customer_reviews.text: This coffee table is FABULOUS. I was on a budget looking for furniture at consignment shops, but everything was broken or not my style. I am SO glad I found this table. It makes my apartment look so expensive. It is very light weight and easy to move. I was concerned about the color clashing because my floors are cherry hardwood floors, but it looks great. I could not be happier with the table :):)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: For the price range you can not beat unless you are very particular and Me myself I'm not particular so this table works for me and under a hundred bucks you definitely can't complain wow it's faux wood but I just need it to sit there and look pretty and it is definitely pretty right from the box. Very easy to put together my pre-teen Son put it together and it does not wobble but it is delicate so just take it easy while assembling it.
customer_reviews.author: fefe

customer_reviews.title: This is a great table for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table for the price. We get a lot of compliments on it. You can tell that it's not real wood and that it's not the most expensive thing. But it looks good and is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Zurbruegg

customer_reviews.title: It looked good after installation and was easy to put together but ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the diagonal bars was loose when we installed it, but we figured that the diagonal bars are more for aesthetic purposes vs. stability/foundation purposes. It looked good after installation and was easy to put together but the top "wood" piece is actually a printed covering. The covering lifted in a portion of the table top and there is no way to secure it back down (maybe with super glue) unless we were to take the table apart. BUT for the price of this table, you can't be setting your expectations too high. Looks good if you don't analyze it too much!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and looks really good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and looks really good. I wasn't expecting a nice piece for under 100.00 . Pretty impressed
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice table! Only thing is color looks slightly different in person.
customer_reviews.author: A. Patel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, easy to put together. The price is unbeatable. The top has grains so it looks like real wood.
customer_reviews.author: cokilx

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this coffee table. It is larger and nicer than anticipated. The wood looks slightly darker in real life than in the picture. It looks and feels modern, sturdy, but not too heavy to push over on the rug for morning exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great table- highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, easy to assemble, and looks great. We were very satisfied with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MissAnonymous

customer_reviews.title: Gift for New Home
customer_reviews.text: Gave this table as a gift the recipient found it say to to put together . They said it was a beautiful table . I am glad I gave it to the home owners.
customer_reviews.author: wila

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sturdy, easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy, easy to put together, doesn't create another focal point in the room. The price was fair. It serves its function. This is a nice versatile piece because of its simplicity. It's great for not overdecorating.
customer_reviews.author: JRA

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not the same color as the picture, material looks cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolem496

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this table! Super easy to put together... Very sturdy, and quite larger than I thought it would be! this table is simple, elegant and looks more expensive than it is!! Great buy
customer_reviews.author: JT_1985

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love this coffee table!!! Easy to assemble and fast shipping. Very chic
customer_reviews.author: Danica G

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty and very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: For the price you CANNOT beat this. It's pretty and very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Sessums

customer_reviews.title: Great table! we were very pleased with the look ...
customer_reviews.text: Great table! we were very pleased with the look and size! it was very easy to assemble- took about 35 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this coffee table. Looks high quality for low price. Make sure you keep the tool to tighten the bolts because they become loose sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical like some of the other reviewers, but this is actually a great piece. Looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal R.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. The top is beautiful gray? distress faux wood with texture.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to assemble and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to assemble and looks great. Feels very high quality and looks great in my living room. Highly recommend for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lassoff

customer_reviews.title: Looks great !!
customer_reviews.text: Love the table looks great even though the word is not real.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Bettridge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! So easy to put together and very STURDY. WORTH EVERY PENNY,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous coffee table!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together and looks GORGEOUS. thrilled with this purchase - it looks amazing in my living room
customer_reviews.author: Megan Mulligan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. I always get compliments on this table
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. I always get compliments on this table. Easy to assemble and looks very chic and expensive. One of my favorite purchases
customer_reviews.author: Alexis J. Miguez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Looks so elegant and fashionable!!! Everyone compliments my table!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Super Buy- 100% Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy and beautiful piece to keep in the living room. This is exactly what I needed as it has the correct height and breadth for a coffee table. I can easily keep my feet on it as well. It has enough space to keep all important items that are usually on a coffee table. It compliments with regular carpet and hardwood floor both. It was very easy to assemble and I can say that because I hate assembling stuff. This is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shantanu G.

customer_reviews.title: Love love this table
customer_reviews.text: Love love this table! It's a bit small, but the quality is good and it looks amazing. I'm very happy with it :)
customer_reviews.author: Tereza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this coffee table ! Perfect for my space and literally took 10 mins to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I patched and assembled it creatively and it works fine. Just don't move it lol
customer_reviews.text: Came without hardware, box was destroyed, and corners were damaged. Not worth the headache of sorting it all out. I patched and assembled it creatively and it works fine. Just don't move it lol. If you have better luck, the table is great! Looks like wood and keeps the rustic modern feel that is popular right now.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Forsythe

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I thought that it might look cheap, but it's actually very sturdy and looks beautiful. I'm really happy with this coffee table. Very simple to assemble too!
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter and son-in-law and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Love this table - particularly for the price. Assembly was easy - fun actually. I was a little worried screws wouldn't go in properly etc but everything fit perfectly. I'm going to look for something similar in a taller (sofa) table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Reclaimed-Look/Chrome Metal Cocktail Coffee Table, Dark Sonoma
product_meta.description: This contemporary coffee table has a beautiful reclaimed wood look on the top and x-design sides. The living space accent piece is ideal for use as a coffee table to suit any decor. Frame comes in chrome finish. Measures 17 inches high x 44 inches wide x 22 inches deep.
feature_bullets: Finish: Chrome and Reclaimed wood look
Dimensions: 17 inches high x 44 inches wide x 22 inches deep

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars47 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
